short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add a progress bar to all Instagram videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instagram Video Progress Bar is a browser extension designed to optimize your Instagram video - viewing experience. It adds a progress bar to all Instagram videos, allowing users to easily control the playback progress.
After installing the extension, an icon will appear in your browser's toolbar. Clicking on this icon reveals a switch. When the switch is turned on, the extension adds a progress bar to the bottom of all videos on the page. The progress bar consists of a background bar and an inner bar that indicates the current playback position, and it updates dynamically as the video plays. When the switch is turned off, the progress bars disappear.
This extension has significant advantages. It enables users to precisely control the playback progress, quickly jump to any position in the video, which is especially useful for long - form videos. Moreover, it provides a more convenient way to interact with videos, enhancing the overall viewing experience.
